page.title: 09PARENTS' LIVELIHOODS
page.content: We have our own little shop, called Bowden Antiques. It is open on Mondays, Tuesdays and Fridays, but we seem to do better on closed days. Thursdays are normally auction days. On Saturdays we sometimes go to Peacocks', another auction place. We sell antiques mostly at antiques fairs. At auctions you are really either very pleased with what you've sold or very disappointed. {Cheryl {Bowden (9)} Mummy and Tony own a video shop in Hitchin. Each morning they leave home at 8.45 so that they can arrive by 10. They stay till 8 pm daily but Sundays only till 4 pm. They order and buy new films. They work very hard especially when they have to look after us as well.{Samantha Field (9) {
